step1.title: Tell us about you
step1.subtitle: Help us personalize your experience
step1.termsAgreement: By clicking "Continue", you agree to our <termsLink>Terms</termsLink> and have read our <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.

step2.title: What do you want to use Blawby AI for?
step2.subtitle: This helps us provide more relevant suggestions

askAway.title: Ask away
askAway.description: Blawby AI can answer legal questions, help you understand legal concepts, review documents, and much more.

privacy.title: Don't share sensitive info
privacy.description: Chat history may be reviewed or used to improve our services. Learn more about your choices in our <helpCenterLink>Help Center</helpCenterLink>.

accuracy.title: Check your facts
accuracy.description: While we have safeguards, Blawby AI may give you inaccurate information. It's not intended to give legal advice.

lawyer.title: Welcome, Counselor
lawyer.subtitle: Set up your practice to start receiving and managing client intakes.

client.title: Welcome to your Legal Portal
client.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your legal situation in one secure place.

messaging.title: Message your Lawyers
messaging.description: Communicate directly with your legal team to ask questions and share updates instantly.

matters.title: Manage your Case
matters.description: Access case documents, view milestones, and monitor the progress of your legal matters.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.description: Pay retainer fees and settle invoices directly via our integrated Stripe portal.

businessWelcome.title: Welcome to your Business Practice!
businessWelcome.subtitle: Your organization is now ready to scale. Here are the tools at your fingertips:

intake.title: Client Intake
intake.description: Share your public link to accept automated intake forms and capture new leads effortlessly.

messaging.title: Client Messaging
messaging.description: Message your clients directly through our secure interface to keep them updated on their case.

matters.title: Matter Management
matters.description: Organize case details, store legal documents, and track milestones from a single workspace.

billing.title: Billing & Finance
billing.description: Set up custom billing plans and manage payments and payouts securely via Stripe.

consultation.title: Need to speak to a lawyer?
consultation.description: Share a few details and we will connect you with the right attorney for your situation.

error.title: Practice details unavailable
error.description: We could not load the practice name and logo {{slug}}. Please refresh or contact the practice to confirm their public settings.
